ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Hello, I am back!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I see..ok heres a question for you, say you dye your handslot green for example then you go and changeout the item you had on your hand to something without a
ygData.messageBody:
I see..ok heres a question for you, say you dye your handslot green for
example then you go and changeout the item you had on your hand to something
without a graphic like silver chitin handwraps, will the green still show
up?

Dabruiser Troll <Death Alliance>
Warrior of the 29th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Sunday, September 21, 2003 4:03 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello, I am back!!



> Are the new item augmentions kinda like the same thing with Diablo? And
> what are charms used for? And with the armor dyes, can you preview the
> armor your going to dye before you actually do it? Yeah David the
Froglocks
> took over the Troll city of Grobb, but once I get back (48 days and a wake
> up!) I will reclaim that city back for Dabashers (at least until the
guards
> respawn) Happy Hunting people!
>
> Dabruiser Troll <Death Alliance>
> Warrior of the 29th Season
>
They are similar to Diablo but the slots on the items are not visible. and
certain types of stones can only be put in certain slots and certain items
only have certain types of slots. It will just have in item description that
it has one slot, type 4, and whether or not it's empty. Plus you have to
combine them. I guess sort of like combining things in the cube in diablo.
Even if you don't have the dye you can preview the way you will look with
the dye. It doesn't dye the actual armor piece, it dyes that slot on your
body. So if you change armor, your new armor will be the same color. You can
toy with the Red Green Blue value and pick color combos you like in various
places. I've seen trolls wearing hot pink. It's pretty cool.
Cool! Heh. I think the little froggie guards like me. Unless they are
undead, most frogloks like me. My undead faction in lower guk is bottomed
out though. No pun intended.
luv,
-Su
